title: Help...
content:
I've been struggling to find a complimentary font to pair up with this script font, any help would be greatly appreciated!

-

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417120518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sp_5200.jpg)
author: Tamarind

comments.content: Knowing a bit more on the intended usage would be helpful.

Hey!

It may end up being used as a logo for my band :)

Not knowing what kind of music your band performs, I will go with a generic suggestion that is a pretty common visual style nowadays: a fairly bold geometric sans. You can choose betwen classics such as Futura or Avenir, neo-classics as Proxima Nova or Gotham, or hip faux-retro offerings from the like of Gestalten or Lineto.

Thanks so much for your help! We're a kind of rock band with subtle hints of folk here and there...

I've attached a Futura example and a typeface I found which I think might work?

Futura [http://i62.tinypic.com/2vtuxxl.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417120518/http:/i62.tinypic.com/2vtuxxl.jpg)

Alternative [http://i59.tinypic.com/2lmntsm.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417120518/http:/i59.tinypic.com/2lmntsm.jpg)
